- The [93mHidden[0m [92mArchitecture[0m of [93mInertia[0m: [93mStakeholder[0m [93mPerspectives[0m on the [93mMost[0m [93mPressing[0m [93mChallenges[0m in [93mPharmacy[0m [93mEducation[0m.: [93mObjective[0m: The [93mobjectives[0m of this [93mstudy[0m were to ([93m1[0m)[93midentify[0m [93mconvergent[0m/[93mdivergent[0m [93mchallenges[0m in [93mpharmacy[0m [93meducation[0m, ([93m2[0m)[93mdevelop[0m a [92mmodel[0m to [93mdemonstrate[0m how these [93mchallenges[0m [33mlead[0m to [93mstagnation[0m in [93mpharmacy[0m [93meducation[0m, ([93m3[0m)[93midentify[0m [92msystemic[0m [93mdrivers[0m/[93mrestraining[0m [93mforces[0m that [93minfluence[0m [91mchange[0m, and ([93m4[0m)[95mexplore[0m [93mperceived[0m [93madvantages[0m/[93mdisadvantages[0m of [93meducational[0m [93mtransformation[0m. [93mMethods[0m: This [93mqualitative[0m [93mstudy[0m [93mused[0m [93mgrounded[0m [93mtheory[0m and [93mthematic[0m [93manalysis[0m to [93manalyze[0m [93mdata[0m from [93m27[0m [93mfocus[0m [93mgroups[0m [93mcomprising[0m [93meight[0m [93mstakeholder[0m [93mgroups[0m: [93mstudents[0m, [93mfaculty[0m, [93mpreceptors[0m, [93mdeans[0m, [93mhealthcare[0m [93mprofessionals[0m, [93mpayors[0m, [93mprofessional[0m [93morganization[0m [33mleaders[0m, and [93mpractice[0m [93mtransformation[0m [33mleaders[0m. [93mDiscussions[0m were [93mtranscribed[0m, [93mcoded[0m, and [93manalyzed[0m [93miteratively[0m to [93midentify[0m [93mthemes[0m, [93mstakeholder[0m [93mconvergence[0m/[93mdivergence[0m, and [93mperceived[0m [93mtrade[0m-[93moffs[0m [93mrelated[0m to [93meducational[0m [93mreform[0m. [93mResults[0m: [93mFour[0m [93minterconnected[0m [93mthemes[0m were [93midentified[0m: a [93mpersistent[0m [93mcompetency[0m-[93mpractice[0m [93mgap[0m; a [93mfragmented[0m [93mprofessional[0m [93midentity[0m; [93mrising[0m [93mresource[0m and [93msustainability[0m [93mchallenges[0m; and [93mstrong[0m [93mresistance[0m to [91mchange[0m. These [93mthemes[0m were [93mmapped[0m into [93mtwo[0m [93mreinforcing[0m [93mcycles[0m, the [93mEducational[0m [93mInertia[0m [93mCycle[0m and the [93mProfessional[0m [93mIdentity[0m [93mCycle[0m, [93mshowing[0m how [93moutdated[0m [93mcurricula[0m, [93munclear[0m [93mrole[0m [93mdefinitions[0m, and [93minstitutional[0m [93mobstacles[0m [93mcontinue[0m to [93mcreate[0m [93mmisalignment[0m. [93mCross[0m-[93mstakeholder[0m [93manalysis[0m [93mrevealed[0m [93mshared[0m [93mconcerns[0m but [93mvaried[0m [93mpriorities[0m, with [93mstudents[0m and [93mpreceptors[0m [93memphasizing[0m [93mpractice[0m [93mreadiness[0m, while [93mfaculty[0m and [93mdeans[0m [93mhighlighting[0m [93mburnout[0m and [93mresource[0m [93mconstraints[0m.
